  • Uses of StoreConfiguration.Pkcs11Configuration in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.config

    Methods in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.config that return types with arguments of type StoreConfiguration.Pkcs11Configuration
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<StoreConfiguration.Pkcs11Configuration>
    StoreConfiguration.pkcs11()
    If the type is "PKCS11" and a provider that is not statically configured for PKCS#11, additional PKCS#11 configuration needs to be supplied.
